tns:patch.author: bmokandu
tns:patch.description: add the global setting to ensure that we only fetch validated ongoing projects for public portal

script.lang: insert into amp_global_settings(id,settingsName,settingsValue,possibleValues,description, section) values (nextval('amp_global_settings_seq'), 'Fetch Only Validated/Ongoing Projects for Public Portal','true','t_Boolean','Fetch Only Validated/Ongoing Projects for Public Portal', 'general');
